attributes.action: Close all airport capacity in the UK opened since 1995 & return to greenfield state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Air travel is one the most polluting form of transport & should not be allowed to expand. It is mainly unnecessary unless your only concern is the love of money, it destroys significant tracts of land & homes, disturbs the peace & wildlife and is a massive consumer of resources and producer of C02.
